mapper.select: SELECT VEND_CD, VEND_NM, BINZO, TELNO FROM VEND
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ORDER_SHEET o USING DUAL ON (o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET o.EDCTS_CD = #{edctsCd}, o.VEND_CD = #{vendCd}, o.VEND_NM = #{vendNm}, o.ORDER_DT = #{orderDt}, o.PROG_APPE = #{progAppe}, o.PAPRD_DT = #{paprdDt}, o.PRDT_NM = #{prdtNm}, o.ORDER_CNT = #{orderCnt} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (o.ORDER_NO, o.EDCTS_CD, o.VEND_CD, o.VEND_NM, o.ORDER_DT, o.PROG_APPE, o.PAPRD_DT, o.PRDT_NM, o.ORDER_CNT) VALUES(#{orderNo},#{edctsCd},#{vendCd},#{vendNm},#{orderDt},'InProgress',#{paprdDt},#{prdtNm},#{orderCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.order_no, p.edcts_lot_no, p.edcts_cd, o.prdt_nm, p.insp_cnt FROM PRDT_INSP p JOIN ORDER_SHEET o ON p.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.PROG_APPE = 'Completed'

SELECT i.edcts_ist_no, i.edcts_ist_dt, i.edcts_ist_cnt, i.edcts_cd, i.edcts_lot_no, e.prdt_nm FROM edcts_ist i JOIN edcts e ON i.edcts_cd = e.edcts_cd WHERE i.edcts_ist_dt BETWEEN #{edctsIstDtStart} AND #{edctsIstDtEnd}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_SHEET SET PROG_APPE = 'Completed' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, VEND_NM, EDCTS_CD, PRDT_NM, ORDER_CNT, PAPRD_DT FROM ORDER_SHEET WHERE PROG_APPE = 'Completed'
SELECT EDCTS_CD, EDCTS_LOT_NO, EDCTS_OUST_DT, EDCTS_OUST_CNT FROM edcts_oust WHERE EDCTS_OUST_DT BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) AND SYSDATE
SELECT E.EDCTS_CD, S.EDCTS_LOT_NO, E.PRDT_NM, S.LOT_CNT FROM EDCTS E JOIN EDCTS_STC S ON E.EDCTS_CD = S.EDCTS_CD WHERE E.EDCTS_CD = #{edctsCd} AND S.LOT_CNT != 0
